name: Just Wak and Beats
description:
Fangame for "Woowakgood", based on "Just Shapes and Beats"

Are you ready to embark on a rhythmic and colorful adventure? Introducing Just Wak and Beats, the electrifying fangame inspired by the mesmerizing world of “Woowakgood” and the adrenaline-pumping gameplay of “Just Shapes and Beats”. Get ready to groove your way through an epic journey in search of lost colors and ancient artifacts!

Prepare yourself for a gameplay experience like no other. Just Wak and Beats seamlessly combines the high-octane action of bullet hell games with the addictive allure of rhythm-based mechanics. As Wak navigates through the beat-infused landscapes, deadly obstacles will come at him in sync with the pulsating soundtrack. Dive, dodge, and dance your way past walls of sound, explosive boss battles, and heart-pounding crescendos.

name: ZX Spectrum Pac-Man Arcade
description:
This is a faithful conversion of the original Pac-Man arcade for the ZX Spectrum 48K. Everything was recreated with as much detail as possible through hours of reading of multiple Pac-Man guides and playing the original game. Being a conversion, some concessions were made to work around the limitations of the 48K but the overall result is still pretty close. The game runs at a silky smooth 50fps with game sound and no tearing or flickering.

All the level progression, logic, rules and timings are implemented exactly like the arcade. All the intermissions are included at the end of the right levels. All the ghost logic was replicated exactly as the original. A fix has been made to Inky's logic which had a bug in the original. Game does not "crash" like the original arcade at the end of level 256. It simply ends with a Game Over. It also supports a 2 Players game like the arcade.

name: Coffee Buns
description:
Coffee Buns is an 18+ Transformation Visual Novel set after the events of Mice Tea. It's been two years since since the worldwide release of Kemono Tea, which turns the people who drink it into anthropomorphic animals. Society is still adjusting to the idea of real-life furries, but that doesn't mean you can skip your day-job.

Leonardo Bianco is a barista at a struggling café. His boss feels like hopping on the furry train might be just the thing to attract customers to the floundering business. Via a connection at another local business (which some returning readers might recognize), Leo and his co-workers are offered a chance to try transforming themselves. The tea works as advertised, but for Leo, there's more changes he didn't anticipate.

name: The Last Revenant
description:
Made for the 22nd Metroidvania Month Game Jam, The Last Revenant is an atmospheric sci-fi action metroidvania with horror elements, multiple upgrades to collect and a short but engaging story to uncover.

Over 1200 years into the future, the last of a series of faulty cryosleep pods finally collapses open on a faraway lunar outpost. Sombre, a poor soul with little left of their original form, is serving their sentence on a barren moon with no way to call for help. The only possibility of survival lies in an abandoned comms satellite located in low orbit, which they can only reach by collecting items to survive the harsh journey across and beyond the facility. Entrusted with a spare Hookshot, Sombre will have to try and upgrade this tool to cling to salvation.

But what happened to the rest of the research colony, and their bodies..?

name: MisBloody
description:
Embark on an electrifying adventure that combines action and agility in a relentless challenge.

Face deadly enemies while moving swiftly and precisely through complex and perilous environments. This game is a brutal test of reflexes and reasoning, where every decision you make can be the difference between success and failure, or even life and death. Get ready for a breathtaking challenge that will push your mind and skills to the limit.

She entrusts the protagonist with a mysterious, golden bird's egg. If the protagonist can make someone happy, the phoenix can rise again. "What I am about to tell you is the end of the fake world, that was created by God."

The girl speaks to him, "This is a story of love, madness and the bizarre, the end of... "me"."
At 4 am, the Phoenix awaits its end. You and I, who have sinned, spend our last moments together.

When a mysterious force causes Jack's YouTube account to be demonetized the moment he prepares to upload his new video, he sets off on a grand, WACKY journey across dimensions!

name: Buckshot Roulette
description:
Buckshot Roulette is a tabletop horror game that attempts to re-design the infamous game of Russian Roulette, replacing the traditional revolver with a proper 12-gauge pump-action shotgun. This extra firepower, and more importantly the different mechanics in handling a shotgun compared to a revolver, offers a fresh take on the classic and deadly game of chance.

The game takes place at the top of an underground nightclub, where the metal railings tremble to the pulse of long lost drum machines. A crooked AI dealer is waiting for you. Will you meet them?

name: Ore Quest: Digger's Delve

description: Underground Waifus it's a CCG, Deck Builder TCG with PVP Card Battler F2P Game.

name: Cosmic Resistance
description: Gear up, gamers! Brace yourself for an epic sci-fi strategy casual game where Aliens have swept across the cosmos, leaving humanity's fate hanging by a thread. The weight of liberation falls on your shoulders. Are you ready, General, to step up and become humanity's last hope?

name: Conviction
description: Conviction is a FPS, Dark fantasy DOOM-like, play as a man with nothing left to lose as you face off the onslaught of cultists and demons in a world enshrouded by darkness, prepare to show your conviction...

name: Hypersomnia
description:
Hypersomnia is a fast-paced online shooter released as free software, aspiring to become an MMO with elements of RPG.

Set in a hypothetical afterlife reality, it shall provide joy through altruistic behaviours, fierce fights, fulfillment of elaborate social roles or sowing panic as a traitor to benevolent ones.

Declare allegiance to one of the three factions whose apple of discord is a disparity between prevailing notions of moral excellence. Metropolis. Atlantis. Resistance.

name: Mobius Band
description: Mobius band is a novella visual novel game. In such an era, everyone is powerless to care for others. Under the skin of prosperous civilization, it is a veritable hell. In the war that has not yet subsided, how will they choose in the end.

name: S.E.C.U.
description: S.E.C.U. is a Roguelite FPS Game. descend to the hellish and demon infested lands in Rougelite Mode or Survive against waves of demons in Arenas

name: Magicians Dead: Force of the Soul
description: Magicians Dead: Force of the Soul is a multiplayer team battle action game for the PS4.

name: Merge Mend
description:
Wow, our cozy hometown is all over the place! What happened here?

Let's roll up our sleeves, rebuild this village, and bring everyone back together!

We're going to transform our town back into the charming and serene place we love!

name: The Cursed Heart: Book 2
description: The Cursed Heart, Book 2 is the second and final book of The Cursed Heart series. It succeeds its first book, The Cursed Heart, Book 1.

name: Simple Mind
description: A version of the classic "Mastermind" logic puzzle for the Playdate console.

name: Forza Motorsport: 2021 Cadillac #31 Whelen Racing DPi-V.R
description: Forza Motorsport 2021 Cadillac #31 Whelen Racing DPi-V.R

name: Christmas Fables: The Magic Snowflake DLC
description: A magical snowflake has fallen into the hands of a little troublemaker! Save Christmas and find the magic artifact!

name: Speedster's Collection
description: What better way to explore a beautiful coastal city than from behind the wheel of a luxury sports car? It’s your chance to drive the newest, most powerful cars around!

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Geography II
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme/ Geography II

name: The VHS Paradise
description: You are Robert, the cashier from The VHS Paradise. Your job is to serve customers on the night shift, but be careful! There is a lot of crime in the city and all kinds of crazy people on the loose.

name: Demonology 101
description: A small game about finding the true names of demons.

name: Pixel Monk
description: An atmospheric game about prayer and ducks.

name: Christmas Fables: The Magic Snowflake - Collector's Edition
description: A magical snowflake of infinite power is lost, but not hope or holiday spirit! Save Christmas and rescue the dangerous artifact from the hands of a small troublemaker!

name: Melia Keys In... Quantum Decade
description: It's hard being a weeb in your 20's... especially when an alien fangirl from space mistakes you for her favorite character!

name: Pirates vs. Ninjas
description: Pirates vs Ninjas - Ninjas are attacking Pirate Island. You and Your crew must take out ALL of them to Save Your Booty.

name: Welcome to the Karoshi Club
description: If you're nervous about job searching and interviews, face your fears head-on in "Welcome to the Karoshi Club" a Japanese horror business punk visual novel.

name: Epic Eon
description: Epic Eon is a single-player RTS game set in a unique fantasy world distinct from other RTS games. It doesn't include workers, buildings, or resource gathering. Instead, monarchs lead factions, create units, capture resources, and engage in combat to conquer rival monarchs.

name: Henry's Escape: Prison
description: “Henry’s Escape" is an immersive adventure game where you need to use your puzzle-solving skills to help Henry, who is wrongfully accused of murdering his wife, Elena, to escape from prison and uncover the true killer. The game’s realistic graphics and puzzles make for an entertaining experience.

name: Valuable Cargo
description: Valuable Cargo is a 3D forklift simulator. Your task - to transport goods across different levels and deliver them to the required places. The game features different locations, each location will require attention and skills from you, as various obstacles await you on the way to delivering goods.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Crown of the Mundane and Divine
description:
Version 1.6 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Ruan Mei, Dr. Ratio and Xueyi
• New area: Herta Space Station - Seclusion Zone
• New Forgotten Hall stages
• Simulated Universe update
• New event: Pure Fiction
• …and more!

name: Maze!
description: Maze! is a top-down 2D indie game featuring minimalist visuals and procedurally generated mazes. Choose from four different algorithms, customize maze sizes to your liking, and race against time for high scores.

name: Heading Home
description: Join Glyph, an orange robot on a heartfelt adventure around the world seeking safety and happiness. As Glyph traverses the globe collecting the cherished chocolat mint ice cream adored by his girlfriend, he'll realize that home is sometimes not a place but a person.

name: Moi Moi Heroes
description: Moi Moi Heroes offers a wacky adventure on Moi Moi Island! Team up for wild co-op puzzles to reach King Moi Moi's crown, engage in royal tag battles to steal it from your friends, and return it to the King to score. Become the ultimate "Moi Moi Hero" in this uproarious showdown!

name: Gash
description: Gash is a hack-and-slash roguelike game. You play as a ronin seeking to become the strongest swordsman in the Sengoku era of Japan. Battle legendary foes to take on your challenge to become the greatest!

name: Kekcroc Forever
description: Kekcroc Forever is a MegaDrive-style game based on a fictional character Kekcroc.

name: Medieval Knight
description: In Medieval Knight you found your own village, manage your dynasty and have to engage in diplomacy with other people, villages and towns.

name: Changeling Tale
description: Fantasy and reality collide in Changeling Tale, a story-rich visual novel about finding one's "true" self... and true love! Help a young man returning from war rebuild his life, kindle new romances, and reveal a secret that will forever transform the lives of those closest to him - literally!

name: Evector: Acid Thirst
description: EVECTOR is a fast-paced arcade FPS shooter with run-and-shoot action, intense battles with short respawn times, and checkpoint based progress (no more save/load cheating). If you're looking for a classic FPS game experience, then try this one!

name: Shooting Blocks
description: Survive the waves of enemies. Use different guns to survive longer than others.

name: Escape Capyland
description:
An amazing, yet depressing place where your goal is to survive the night! You are stuck in your office till 6 AM, and all you can do is 'keep them away'.

Good luck in your shift!

name: Ultimate FPS Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Quizz: Multiplayer Pack
description: In order to play the game multi-player, you need this DLC

name: The 2030 Proto-Interfacer's Guide to House-Oriented Emotional Exploration
description: The game is an educational interactive computer software package adaptation of the New York Times #1 Bestselling book of the same name. Made by interfacers, for the means of enhancing the transitory period of the ones that may, or may not, come before. It lets you emulate the beautiful experience of being invited to a party, and then being at the party, in an unsafe environment.

name: Starship Showdown: Galactic Grand Prix
description: Take part in exciting turn-based space races with up to 5 players. Navigate astral paths, avoid obstacles and claim intergalactic glory.

name: Driving World Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Wild River Run: Map Pack - Sci-FI
description: Add two new locations to your lineup of levels with the Map Pack - Locations DLC.

name: Early-blooming Black Lily: Hana to Itsuki no Gojitsudan 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Divarr
description: Sin descripción

name: DarkAndLight
description: Use clues to power up generators, find weapons to kill zombies, and utilize items to escape the bunker maze!

name: A Spider to A Fly
description: 90's Horror inspired Point & Click — a Dark and Emotional journey of a man looking for his missing son while facing his hidden demons. Enjoy an Atmospheric & stylized world, haunting and memorable audio, and piece together a story that will stay with you long after it ends.

name: Fighting
description: A battle role-playing game The main task is for players to control the protagonist in battles, defeat enemies one by one, gain experience points and coins to upgrade. Further acquire stronger weapons and skills.

name: 3D Puzzle: Breaking Bed
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 3D Puzzle: Post-Apocalyptic 3
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Christmas Puzzle 5
description: Complete matching puzzle levels and create a gingerbread Hansel and Gretel decoration. Tackle a series of quests from cleaning cookie crumbs to creating a gingerbread house, a castle and a chocolate factory. Get ready for a heartwarming conclusion as the characters find their way home.

name: Scream or Die: Virtual Circus
description: Horror game. The player needs to get out of the maze with animatronics.

name: Bombcapsule
description: Run and Dodge, and Destroy the waves of Bombs. Brand New Arena Shooter!

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Animals
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Animals - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Divine Journey: The Life of Jesus
description: Embark on a Devine Journey, a captivating game narrating Jesus' life through 25 chapters, from birth to resurrection. Experience divine miracles and profound teachings.

name: Cannon Master: Military Sport
description: In this unusual game you will shoot with cannons at many types of targets, and you will also find arcade and logical elements. Each subsequent level is a new challenge.

name: Ninja Attack
description: You play as a ninja fending off waves of various types of ghosts, each getting increasingly difficult from the last. How many waves can you last before the ghost onslaught overwhelms you.

name: DunJumb
description: Whether you choose magic, swords, or both, make your way through the thousands of monsters attacking you! DunJumb is a colorful 2D medievial survivor game with roguelite elements, in which you create, buy and reinforce a combination of weapons against formidable enemies!

name: StreamWare
description: In StreamWare, you have the unique opportunity to be both the star streamer and the avid viewer. Dive into a universe filled with fun and dynamic mini-games that will connect you in an unparalleled way with your favorite streamer or your loyal Twitch audience.

name: Kings Call
description: Kings call is a free-to-play, trading-card based MMO . Playable through a browser, the game allows players to take the role of the Lord of Silver Heron Ridge

name: Prelude to Nuss Jump
description: Talking about the year 2022 Before the story of the Eastern Holy Son, we must first know this story When all the memory fragments are connected together, for him, there is only a devastating spiritual blow. But he must go through all this because This Everything is for a great mission!

name: The White Owl
description: The White Owl is a short atmospheric horror experience.

name: Galacticverse
description: Galacticverse is an open-world, multiplayer game where players can embark on a cosmic adventure of exploration, space mining, and social interaction.

name: Maze Knight
description: This is a role-playing game with a realistic European medieval fantasy theme. The player plays a knight and goes alone to the legendary forbidden island to find out the hidden historical truth hidden in the maze.

name: Ultimate Speed Run
description: Simple, clean and fun, Ultimate Speed Run is a test of your gaming ability. It will push you to the max and not let you relax! There is no 'chance' in this game, it is all down to your skill as a gamer! Take the test... be the best, be the Ultimate Speed Runner!

name: Nonotown
description: Play classic and colored nonograms or picross.

name: Seal World
description: Meet friendly seals, eat fibsh, swim, and relax! Become a seal!

name: Annihilator
description: Annihilator is a gritty top-down shooter for the Game Boy Color. You play as Shinryu, after awakening from a robotic slumber. You seek revenge for the theft of you and your family.

name: Fly
description:
Fly is game for the Meta Quest and Apple Vision pro headsets that uses Google Earth data to let the user explore the world.

Embark on an extraordinary journey with FLY, and redefine the way you explore our planet. Powered by Google's cutting-edge 3D Maps Tiles, this immersive experience lets you soar through the skies and witness the world's wonders like never before. From the ground all the way to the edge of space, you can truly Fly for the first time.

name: Siren Head: Terrifying Story
description: Siren Head: Terrifying Story is a Adventure game developed by Poison Games.

name: Conduct Together!: Track Pack 2
description:
The Conduct TOGETHER! Track Pack 2 expands and changes your conducting journey with 25 new levels spread across 5 new worlds.

Some of these levels will include new features and tracks to challenge you in different ways.

One such example is the new railway turntable that will let you rotate tracks to connect in new ways.

name: The Intern of Christmas Present
description: The Intern of Christmas Present is a visual novel where Pressie's last trial before becoming a holiday specter is turning the heart of Girl Dracula, enemy of Christmas. It is a sequel to the story "Vamp Me!" in the developer's previous visual novel, A Trick and a Treat.

name: Hyperjustice: Hyper Holidays Expansion
description: Clive Lawman is on a Christmas trip to New York but the mob has kidnapped him and have evil plans to ruin Christmas. This is a very short 3-part level expansion for Hyperjustice.

name: Neuro Hacker: Truth
description: Sin descripción

name: Buddy & Friends: Santa's Workshop Animal Party
description: Buddy is back! Leading his friends on an exciting mission to save Christmas, collecting and protecting gifts in Santa's frenetic factory.

name: Jigsaw Pets
description: Solve 45 beautiful puzzles of pets including dogs, cats, horses and some magical friends

name: Human Bowling
description: Roll a human bowling ball

name: Gang Blast
description: Awesome helicopter shooting action!

name: Santa's Workshop Challenge: The North Pole Gift Adventure
description: Discover unpublished and magical stories of Santa Claus, with beautiful illustrations and enchanting music. It's an interactive Christmas adventure for all ages.

name: Super Kart Mini Car Race
description: Super Kart Mini Car Race is an exciting and colorful racing game in the style of Classic Kart.

name: 4x4 OffRoad Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Nothing to Declare
description: As a guardian of the customs realm, you hold sway over the comings and goings of travelers, packages, and cargo containers alike. Do you possess the mettle to tackle such a formidable responsibility?

name: Virtue
description: A customizable event display for collider experiments for desktop or virtual reality. Explore electron-proton collisions in the ePIC detector at the future Electron-Ion Collider, or upload your own detector geometry and collision data to be animated.

name: Snow Day

name: Broadsword Jim Saves Christmas
description: A new single map for GZDoom, done for @Baratus's birthday using their and Skelegant's custom weapons mod Broadsword Jim, a modifier that puts you in the metallic, armored shoes of Jim, a sword-headed wielder of both medieval and modern weaponry. ﻿

name: 200 Line Christmas: Snowy Slaughter
description:
200 Line Christmas: Snowy Slaughter is a community project targeting MBF21 (complevel 21). The project is inspired by Arsinikk and NinjaDelphox's Line Massacre Series and is the sequel to 100 Line Christmas. It uses the new Doom Christmas Enhanced resource pack with some new additions specific to the project.

As the 200 in the title suggests, each map was limited to 200 lines at most. Each mapper was asked to add some kind of friction in their maps (Either slippery ice or heavy snow). In addition, each map has a hidden runaway gnome for you to grab (replacing the item count)!

name: Neural Parasite
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin Lost Hope
description: This mod / ROM hack for Pikmin 2 includes 11 chapter levels, with (almost) no caves, remixed areas and treasures.

name: Trash Punk
description: Rock the apocalypse in punk style!

name: My Bakery Empire: Bake With Taste
description: Make your cakes look special with new colorful decorations and compete in VIP competitions to win big prizes!

name: My Bakery Empire: Bake With Style
description: Give Lizzie a new look with cute, brand-new clothes, hairstyles, and accessories!

name: Eroblast: Spicy Twixmas
description: Sin descripción

name: 3in1 Game Collection: Backgammon + Checkers + Mills
description: Discover three exciting board games!

name: Classic Games Collection Vol.1: Holiday Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooking Tycoons: 3 in 1 Bundle Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling Fever
description: Fire up "Bowling Fever" and be carried away by the emotions!

name: DNA: Episode 1
description: DNA is an episodic retro, story-driven 2D side scrolling beat em' up that welcomes the world into the DNA universe in a highly interactive anime where the player completes side scrolling segments while progressing through engaging animations depicting the fascinating origins story of DNA.

name: Falnarion Tactics III
description: A missing queen, a world engulfed in war, a mysterious new hero. Take control of a colorful cast of characters from both the perception of the heroes and the villains, as you fight the final battle for Nerfelo.

name: EndlessCar
description: The car passes through obstacles to earn points mini-game.

name: Watcher
description: Sin descripción

name: Phantom Unit 999
description: There is a new danger that has befallen the world, which has led to creatures being brought to life Adam is the leader of Unit "Phantoms 999", With your help, you and Adam and his team will pass through strange worlds, upgrade your weapons, and try hard to end this danger and kill whoever caused it.

name: Chanye's Home
description: Lam ChoTung, who runs a maid cafe in Shenzhen, discovered a girl sitting unconscious on the ground at the storefront as she prepared to return home from the shop. This girl not only had unclear consciousness but was also dressed in peculiar maid attire. This is a love story about these two girls.

name: Pocket Foosball
description: Pocket Foosball - Table football excitement, Switch-Style!

name: Don't Melt the Snowman
description: ​A festive hangman type word game which is fun to play - but Don't Melt the Snowman

name: Merry XMerge
description: Merry XMerge is a good board game for all ages this Christmas. Put together Christmas cakes and candies to make them more attractive. Merry Christmas.

name: Multilateral Planet
description: This is a single player game, in this multi-sided planet, humans in order to survive the attack of mutants, built a tall wall, this is the last city of mankind; Players need to control the character to pick up a sword and shield, to kill mutants, get them to drop food and weapons to arm themselves.

name: Zodiac Landing
description: This is a rocket flight simulation game. You will control a rocket by left and right engines to fly in space and try to land on target platform, while enjoying beautiful nebulas and ambient music.

name: It Mimics
description: "It Mimics" is a short indie horror game heavily inspired by the original Slender The Eight Pages game. Step into the shoes of an unknown protagonist, collect the eight pages, and survive being followed by something lurking in the woods.

name: Bloodsong
description: She's just a teenage siren. Let her rock... Play as Mari, a punk rock siren princess, who’s hell-bent on headlining her concert no matter the cost. Use your ear and “bloodsong” to match musical pitch, defeat enemies, and solve puzzles along the way. The stage is set–are you ready to rock?!

name: Astra Ignota
description: A relaxing, space-themed puzzle game where you fill a board using symmetrical figures. An idea originally from the authors of the Sudoku, much harder than it looks! All boards are hand-crafted for maximum enjoyment.

name: Kebab Bar Tycoon
description: Sizzle Your Way to Kebab Royalty!

name: Fashion World
description: Welcome to glamorous "Fashion World," where style meets puzzle in a dazzling arcade adventure!

name: XMas Toy Merge
description: Match as many as you can and get your best score!

name: EndlessEx
description: Simple flying (maybe jumping), mini-games with the goal of the highest score.

name: Light-It Up: Neon Adventure
description: Embark on a neon adventure through more than 130 new levels!

name: Hidden Object Legends: Deadly Love - Collector's Edition
description: The lives of three ordinary men become closely intertwined with the life of one woman. One by friendship, one by love, and one by murder. Will you be able to unravel this tangle and find the murderer?

name: Goi Survivors
description: Humans, dwarves, and elves exploring diverse landscapes and dungeons, they combine their unique abilities in trios to combat mythical creatures and uncover ancient relics, striving to aid the goddess to cleanse the realm of malevolent forces.

name: Planecraft
description: Planecraft is a 2.5D Sandbox game. Build your settlement on the surface map where you grow crops and tend to your livestock or let your settlers do that for you. Explore multiple levels of dungeons below, the depper you go, the better the resources you can find.

name: Neuro Hacker
description: "Neuro Hacker" is a VR game that combines escape room and detective puzzle elements.You will play as a "detective" skilled in hacking into people's minds and solving complex cases. You are about to enter the brain of a survivor of a plane crash, and uncover the dark truth behind the case.

name: A group of beauties surrounded me
description: This is a male-oriented, high-freedom cultivation work. You are the wealthiest man, surrounded by beauty. A total of 155 characters can be pursued, with one tailored to your preferences. The work has super high freedom, with no fixed plot. Come explore five very different plot lines quickly!

name: The Knowledge of Hermit
description: Non-Linear Top-down action-adventure-puzzle game with Power Ups & Health Upgrades.

name: Pond Scum
description:
At the edge of the Deep Swamp stands Snappy and his gang.
Anxious to proceed, they press on as a rite of passage for all young pond dwellers.
What will they find ahead?
Uncover the secrets of the swamp in this Diorama-based VR Platformer.

name: True Abstraction: Plus
description: True Abstraction Plus - remaked predecessor of True Abstraction: Rewind with extended content.

name: The Backrooms: Unbounded
description: The Backrooms: Unbounded is a Free single player first person body camera horror game based on the backrooms. You take the role of a police officer who noclips out of reality while on duty. Will you make it out alive?

name: Protect the Planet
description: This is a simple typing game. In the game, the alien from the UFO is very evil, he will shoot many missiles to attack the planet. You need to type and type, to destroy the missiles, to protect the planet.

name: Furry Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date Cat Girls? - 2 Prophecy of Convenience
description: For generations, Northcreek Academy and Elsinore Academy have been two institutions at odds with one another. You must prep your entourage to survive the upcoming Rose Week, a tournament between both schools that will determine the balance of power in this world.

name: Last Remains
description: Last Remains is a 50-player zombie battle royale game where survivors compete in a PvPvE world and take risks on their journey to the extraction point by searching buildings to find food, water, and digital collectible skins such as equipment and weapons.

name: Deep Death Dungeon Darkness
description: Challenge yourself again and again to meet your dead lover in dark fantasy roguelike action The structure of the Labyrinth of Death, which leads to the underworld, changes every time you play Abundant weapons, heavy action and heavy-handed combat through magic

name: Pocket Quest
description: Recruit a team of valiant heroes and awesome monsters to battle against seven other players for victory! 100+ different heroes, creatures and monsters are ready for battle. Combine their unique skills and abilities to create an original and efficient team to surprise other players and defeat them.

name: Human Zoo
description: Beautiful teenagers, dreams, grotesque orgies. When no one in the world is awake anymore, is your sanity an alternative madness? A turn-based surrealist psychological horror game with beautiful L2D combat artwork and a deep, philosophical plot.

name: Randy Blaster 3D
description: Randy Blaster 3D is a satirical retro-style FPS game where the player faces off against an evil overlord named Randy and his devoted followers. Battle hordes of corrupted beasts and collect Randy’s Vinyls of Power to bring his reign of terror to an end.

name: Frozen Friday Night: The Eve
description: The young's holidays become a nightmare.

name: Tetroi
description: An Arduboy clone of a very well known and successful game from the 80's

name: The Most Terrible Time of the Year
description: A short Christmas horror game where your ultimate goal is to gather 50 scattered Christmas gifts within a mysterious mansion to break free from a twisted holiday nightmare.

name: Banjo-Kazooie Santa's Village
description: Sin descripción

description: Party like it's 2012 with the original outfits from the Flash version of Strike Force Heroes!

name: Hard Racing: Stunt Car Driving
description: A new car racing arcade simulator. GOAT cars, exciting car tuning games, and true driving vibes!

name: Build A Bridge Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Realm of The Lieutenant
description: A repackaged episode of maps done by Kendrick "The Lieutenant" Curtis from 1998-2008.

name: Blue Terror
description: A single vanilla map for Doom II that is blue. Nothing more, nothing less.

name: Gnoll Way Home
description: You awaken in another world, inhabiting the body of one of the realm's most reviled beasts - the savage gnoll. Before you can even come to grips with your situation, you are thrust into a journey to find your place in this world that fears and rejects your very presence. The path to discovering yourself is a dangerous one, but you won't walk that path alone.

name: Battle Santa 64
description:
Play as Santa Claus trying to take back the presents stolen by Bowser, Wario, and Donkey Kong!

You have five minutes to collect as many as you can. They will run away so you will need to chase them down, hit them, and pick up the presents they drop. After five minutes you will see how many you have collected, what your high score is, and can restart by holding A and B simultaneously to try again.

name: Paper io 2: Variety Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Hole io: Red Planet Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Die For Light
description: This is a game about repetition and never ending failure, face the unknown road ahead, failure is inevitable, but "memory" will record this failure for you, help you to cross it next time, until "right".

name: Fade^2
description: FADE^2 is a 2D action game that brings platformer, runner and music interactive genre all together. A desperate journey of the reanimated one, and the storytelling of music from the bleached world. Run along the music, and play along the course!

name: Project N.E.X.T
description: "Project N.E.X.T: A dynamic 3D shooter where Red and Blue teams battle across shifting realms from quaint villages to vibrant cities. Face off in modes like Deathmatch and Survive, with an added twist of zombies. Strategy and skill reign supreme!"

name: Cute Critters Pet Kitty
description: Start your journey of nurturing and attending to your virtual companions.

name: VR Waifu: MuChan
description: Not frustrating control, Not long tutorial, Not lost Willy anywhere. Because Willy is in your hands..."VR Waifu" is easy to play!

name: Truckzilla: Monster Truck Mega Ramp Mania

name: VR Dinosaur Island Paradise
description: This is an immersive VR casual game. Players will experience the fun of driving cars freely in the virgin forest. In the game, you will be in a vibrant dinosaur paradise and enjoy the beauty of nature.

name: Warlords Battlecry: The Protectors of Etheria
description: A terrible threat long foretold rises to finish a war waged in prehistory, throwing Etheria into chaos. Will you save or lose your kindred? In this successor-in-the-making to the RPG/RTS Warlords Battlecry, interact with the world and discover myriad new tactics to dominate the battlefield.

name: Air Hockey VR
description: The ultimate Air Hockey VR simulator

name: Grezzodue 2
description: Grezzodue 2 is an audacious blend of FPS, immersive sim and satirical horror, steeped in a rich, provocative atmosphere. Featuring one of the most expansive open-worlds based on Perugia, Italy, it promises an epic, nonlinear story with multiple outcomes. With its unique combination of ultra-violence, Italian humor, and biting social commentary, Grezzodue 2 stands for audacity, controversy, and unforgettable gaming.

name: Battle of Zodiacs
description: Fully competitive game, where the goal is to dominate your enemy's land! To fulfill their objective, each player will assemble a team of heroes and a deck composed of items and spells. Get ready to enter an epic battle that unites the zodiac signs with the medieval fantasy world!

name: Abhorrent Light
description: A dark medieval first person hack and slash with procedural elements. Navigate the darkness and shed light on what lies below.

name: Dream Team Basketball
description: Dream Team Basketball combines traditional CCG gameplay with innovative mechanics inspired from the game of basketball.

name: Cowbots and Aliens
description: A furious PvP Multiplayer brawl in VR set in the Saloon-iverse of Cowbots and Aliens. Free movement, deadly gunplay, multiple competitive modes and a custom networked physics system that lets you use EVERYTHING as a weapon makes for an immensely satisfying VR ruckus! Includes intensely fun single player AI to play against as well.

name: Havoc Monkeys
description: Havoc Monkeys is a VR game which has a unique movement system, the game has multiple gamemodes and maps to ensure a long lasting play time. There's frequent updates so stay tuned!

name: Another Christmas Game
description: In this game, you follow Lucas, a 16-year-old teenager who decides to spend Christmas alone at home until he realizes that he's not as alone as he thought.

name: The Lights Went Out
description: "The lights went out" is a short horror experience with a bizarre story narrated by the victim himself.

name: Simpler Times

name: Deltatraveler: Section 3
description: Forest (or, alternatively, Section 3) is the third Section of Deltatraveler, taking place in the world of GG!Underfell.

name: Vesseled
description:
Deep into dark sewers, a creature made out of stones awakens. The walls are rotten, the floor slimy, but a calming song plays in the distance...

This vessel's body is weak, only being able to move when not seeing, you'll have to wander into the darkness with absolute certainty, you may not be alone in this journey.

name: Wizzerd Quest
description: Wizzerd Quest is a bite-sized open-world RPG with full split-screen co-op. Its aesthetic is straight out of the mid 1990's, and it's designed to be a fun little excursion without wasting your time. Play the entire game for free with zero microtransactions or DRM!

name: Pipework
description: Researchers discovered an enigmatic fluid resembling water in an unexplored and unfamiliar region. Successfully obtaining a substantial sample, they now aim to transport it beyond the immediate unusual locale. Your task is to navigate its journey to various laboratories worldwide, ensuring its safety by protecting it from any potential adverse reactions.

name: Traffic Master Collection
description: Multitude of obstacles, intense road traffic, exciting races, ramps, beautiful city environments and other surprises – that’s what awaits you in this new, original driving games!

name: Where Jellyfish: +450
description: The body is free, with 100 jellyfish. DLC adds 450 jellyfish on top of the original 100. A total of 550 jellyfish. DLC does not include achievements. You only need to pass the ontology to achieve full success.

name: My Life: Farm Vet
description: They need you on the farm – examine and treat lots of animals!

name: Horo Nite: MelonMelody
description: Horo Nite: MelonMelody is a free unofficial fan project and a homage to the upcoming Hollow Knight Silksong made in Unity.

name: Frostbite Express
description: A train level inspired by Build Engine vehicle levels (see Blood E1M3) and The Polar Express (movie).

name: The Koopa Who Stole Christmas
description: The Koopa Who Stole Christmas is a Christmas themed community ROM hack of Super Mario 64 DS, made by Hailbot and several contributors. The hack features 10 Main Courses and 1 Side Course.

name: Last Seen Online
description: “last seen online” is a psychological horror escape room, based on early flash games. Look through someone's computer files. Solve puzzles and discover the secrets that lie within the computer.

name: Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - False Awakening
description: Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - False Awakening is an indie atmospheric horror game that puts a lot of emphasis on storytelling and puzzle-solving.

name: Sonic Forces Overclocked
description: Sonic Forces Overclocked is a mod for Sonic Forces whose aim is to introduce fully new thought-out levels, with brand-new level design, visuals, and an original soundtrack.

name: Tricky Taps: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Milk Seller
description:
Super Fun!
Super Fun!
Super Fun!

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: DIY Paper Doll: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Astro Miner: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: ASMR Slicing: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Aquarium Land: Puppy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Visit From Above
description: Visit From Above is a sit-and-survive horror game (inspired by Five Nights at Freddy's) that puts you face to face with aliens. You will have to survive 3 nights using different methods to defeat the aliens including a flashlight, turning power on/off, and closing your eyes (pretend to sleep).

name: Santa's busy day
description: Santa has a hard time, delivering all his presents on time. In this little Arcade Game, you will help him fly over the roofs and drop the presents in the right spot. But be careful:The game gets progressivly harder, as Santa's reindeer is flying faster and faster and faster.

name: Great Filter
description: A 2D top-down view, strategy game, with original mechanics. The game consists of 46 levels and each level takes 30-60 seconds to clear. You would strategically operate two characters to collect diamonds from mines, sent diamonds into “little universe” to generate bricks and pave the way to the key.

name: The Nefargad
description: The Nefargad is a thriller, horror, puzzle, and storytelling game that offers a true first-person perspective. The game narrates the story of an archaeologist named Mert, who is kidnapped and imprisoned in a dungeon and his efforts to escape.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Acceleracers Expansion pack
description:
Discover the most secretive underground racing arena in the world of Hot Wheels, where the Teku and Metal Maniacs train to compete in the World Race.

Welcome to the AcceleDrome! Inside Dr Tezla’s headquarters, you can experience all the thrills of racing and the adventures of AcceleRacers, a real treat for all the fans of the series! An immense space that combines the mysterious charm of a gigantic cave with state-of-the-art technological solutions, featuring a holographic Wheel of Power at its centre, dominating the scene.

Explore all the secrets of this new environment aboard Rat-ified, the powerful rat-rod of the Metal Maniacs, Chicane, the high-tech muscle car of the Teku team, Spine Buster, the roaring supercar of Mark Wylde, or Vert’s, the high-performance car of the legendary Vert Wheeler.

name: Fairytale Fables
description: Dive into a fantastical autobattler where fairytales and legends collide! Choose your hero and assemble your team of characters, items and treasures to outwit opponents in strategic battles where positioning matters. Will you be the last one standing in this enchanted PvP arena?

name: Screamdown
description: Scream through your mic at opponents to send them flying into the void in this PvP horror game.

name: Accelerate Zone
description: FULL-THROTTLE STG "ACCELERATE ZONE". This is an action shooting game where the faster you go, the better your strategy. It's okay to take your time and go at your own pace.

name: Skoory Rush
description: The most absurdly amusing arcade game to hit your screens! Can you keep up with the chaos and out-score your friends? Find out as you climb the online leaderboards and become the ultimate Skoory Rush Master!

name: Beginning of the Rain
description: "Beginning of the Rain" is a visual Novel simulation game based on emotional illustrations and OSTs. I tell you a lot of efforts to spend the time of youth more beautifully, and various stories that take place in it.

name: Vulcan Tower Defence
description: Enter the immersive world of Vulcan Tower Defense, where ancient Vulcanites and powerful kings clash with modern heroes defending their towers. This game, more than just a play-to-earn experience, serves as a hub within the groundbreaking Vulcan Forged ecosystem, unlocking endless prizes and opportunities. Dive into the unique universe of VulcanVerse and embark on an epic journey like no other!

name: Necrodemic
description: Necrodemic, is a Free to Play survival-based thriller. Defeat zombie bears to earn essence. Essence can be used to purchase more powerful weapons, ammo, and perks that increase players' chances of survival. Rank in daily competitions and win loot box prizes and a daily leaderboard that rewards players!

name: Midnight Report
description: "Midnight Report" is a rogue-lite 3D survival horror game in which a student (the protagonist) who is having hallucinations while staying up all night writing a report struggles to escape from the hallucinations filled with terrifying monsters. Players use items and gimmicks to overcome threats and aim to escape from the randomly generated fantasy world with their friends.

name: The Smurfs: Learn and Play - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dustbunny: Emotions To Plants
description: Dustbunny is a warm, relaxing yet guided journey of reconnecting with your repressed emotions, where the emotions are cute creatures that like to hide. If you catch one and let it express itself, it can grow into a beautiful plant - some into extremely rare plants! Care for your plants with fun interactions like watering, catching pests and so much more - you can even sing for your plant. Relax with minigames like catching bubbles in your bubble tea. As your room becomes your safe space, you might encounter your inner child in the room's hidden depths.

name: Pocket Mystery EP
description:
Explore a strange hotel and try to uncover the truth behind a mysterious murder as Detective Walker Rylance.

Talk to the hotel staff and guests while reliving the final moments of the victim(s) in this surreal horror adventure game. Oh, there are block puzzles too.

name: A Little to the Left: Merry Mess
description: Merry Mess event unwraps five new puzzles between 22-26 December

name: Minecraft, But If You Touch Grass You Die
description: Minecraft, but if you touch grass you die is a challenge mod for Minecraft based on the traditional children's game the floor is lava, in which the grass block deals damage to the player.

name: Checkers: Playdate
description: Checkers is the well known board game with four difficulties and a jump heuristic for the Playdate handheld

name: Ship of Dreams
description: Ship of Dreams is the first and only book of the Ship of Dreams series.

name: The Kid at the Back
description: "There's this guy, pretty tall guy, often times people don't even realize he's there but he is. Usually sits at the back, wears nothing but black. His eyes however, were bright, red as the autumn leaves, and they for sure aren't leaving your eyes once you lock with his."

name: Me Mostre Sonhos Doces
description: A short queer story about searching for sweet winter dreams.

name: Lost Star
description:
On a snowy night, a witch loses her way home and meets someone new.

Work together as a witch and her cat from space to overcome obstacles and find a way home in this challenging single-player platformer. Summon your familiar and swap places with it to reach new heights, use your broom to soar across chasms, and combine the two for acrobatic action and puzzle solving.

Includes adjustable gameplay speed. Slow things down if you want more time to think with each jump, or speed it up for an extra-fast-paced challenge.

name: Alone: Chapter 1
description:
Your name is Joseph. A boy who was just leaving school and something happened.
You wake up in a room with a small headache. Scared, decide to leave the room and with the only objective: Find a way out.

name: Stop to Explode
description: A SHMUP-Survivor-Roguelike mash where you must dodge, shoot, and upgrade in order to beat the final boss. Created along the LazyDevs academy basic shmup tutorial with its own twists on the theme.

name: Cazzarion: Space Shooter
description:
If you like space shooter and space invader games, you should try this version of a galaxy shoot 'em up.
Galactic war in space and endless waves of alien spaceships are waiting for you!

name: Taco Tides
description: Captain George and his crew of daring cats embark on a taco-filled odyssey, encountering treacherous waters, dastardly duck foes, and a grand admiral with a quacking secret. As you navigate the Taco Tides, you'll sail, shoot, and solve the mystery of disappearing tacos in this purrfectly hilarious and action-packed game.

name: Our Cinderella
description: A texting and stat simulator visual novel about an anxious millennial getting ready to go to a Christmas party while chatting with his childhood friends. He has the ability to attend the party with one of three love interests.

name: Never Gives Up Her Dead
description:
Time is running out after a meteor strikes your interstellar starship. While the crew is under full alert, only you seem to notice the strange red portals opening up throughout the ship.

Explore ten different worlds, learn the truth of your destiny, and confront the mysterious figure who has been haunting you from the start in this epic sci-fi adventure.

name: Abstêmia
description: An endless chime, each second bringing you closer and closer to an imminent end. Embark on an adventure inside the familiar corridors of Eduardo's house and watch his residence slowly transfigure into something grotesque and terrifying. Good luck on your adventure, may they have mercy on your soul. And remember: the C.G.C. is watching you.

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Annapurna Interactive Deluxe Limited Edition Collection
description:
Since the release of What Remains of Edith Finch in 2017, Annapurna Interactive has rhythmically — game after game — nurtured visionary, creator-driven experiences.

Each title is wholly unique, yet when viewed from the macro, as a family of games, the impeccable curation and producorial pedigree of Annapurna becomes clear. We at iam8bit immensely appreciate what our friends at Annapurna have done to elevate gaming, so we partnered with them to produce this one-of-a-kind anthology.

Introducing the Annapurna Interactive Deluxe Limited Edition Collection — a first-of-its-kind release, featuring a whopping 12 games, neatly packed onto a single Switch cart. Just pop it in and watch each title, including 4 previously unreleased physical games, flood your dashboard.

This collection is more than just the games, though. In addition to the ultra premium packaging, we’ve also included a foreword from Annapurna Interactive founder, Nathan Gary, as well as an art booklet featuring exclusive statements from each game’s creative visionaries.

And because the legacy of Annapurna Interactive is so directly intertwined with the history of the Nintendo Switch, we knew this collection needed something extra special to bring it all together. That’s why we’ve included an Exclusive & Luxurious Annapurna Interactive Console & Cartridge Case. Prepare to feel safe, secure, and fashionable as you take your console on-the-go. You won’t find these anywhere else!

name: My Little Universe: Xmas Character Pack
description: Make your experience more festive with 4 new characters!

name: Railbreak: Dinoblast Collection
description: On-rails zombie shooter and a retro survival horror nightmare? I'm in!

name: 9Ball Pocket
description: 9-Ball Pocket brings you eight-ball pool, also known as American billiards. You can compete with up to 4 friends or against the AI in Versus mode, or challenge the best in the world in Arcade mode, where you can make combo shots and rack up points to become Number 1 in the online ranking. All of this comes in a setting with great graphics and Jazz music.

description: Jack Dragon is a retro love letter to classic 80's and 90's arcade games. Avoid nasties, jump on platforms, glide around the screen and collect gems! Sounds easy, right?

name: Point Click Killer: Act Two
description:
Detective Clarke is on the case and hunting the serial killer from the first Point Click Killer game of the series. Can you track down and catch the killer?

Point Click Killer: Act Two is a horror, point & click, gory adventure game that picks up where you left off in the first game. Good luck!

name: Unaccomplished
description: Unaccomplished is a Yume Nikki fangame. Yin Ming wakes up on his balcony in the midst of a thunderstorm. He is unable to leave his room due to it, so all he has left to do is sleep, and dream. The player explores the dream world and collects effects that change Yin Ming's form and grants him new abilities.

name: Milo and the Christmas Gift
description: Milo and the Christmas Gift is a free-to-play short and atmospheric point-and-click adventure game created by artist Johan Scherft. The game is a spin-off story following the events in Milo and the Magpies. The game has 5 chapters and a gameplay time of around 30 minutes!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Mario's Madness v2
description:
Mario's Madness v2 Is Finally Here, 29 NEW and Remade Songs + the original 7 songs from v1, a lot of characters, stages, mechanics and new extra additions in the mod, Beat all the songs to try to defeat mario for good.

Be ready, survive, and say hello to murder.

name: Christmas Bubble Puzzle
description: Dive into the festive world of "Christmas Bubble Puzzle," a delightful and captivating game that blends the excitement of bubble-popping challenges with the joy of the holiday season.

description: HoneyCome come come party dolce is a large-scale downloadable data pack for HoneyCome come come party that powers up the base game with a wide array of new features, and even includes the new Digital Craft system.

name: Night Nite
description: "Night Nite" is a horror comedy adventure game set in modern times. One day, mysterious events begin to unfold around you. What could be the true identity behind these occurrences?

name: Paper Work
description: Navigate a thrilling blend of fast-paced action and RPG looting as you make deals, undertake missions, sign contracts, and raise your character level inside of the urban dungeon crawler Paper Work.

name: Dungeons of Dragons
description: "In an age of guns, swords, and magic, the Philosopher's Stone, which maintains the balance of Dungeons and Dragons, has been stolen. The world hangs in the balance. It's all up to you..."Honestly, we can't make it all up all the time. Let's have an adventure together!

name: Tank Of The Kayra
description: Complete the mission with the Last Remaining Tank!

name: Lost Mansion
description: A request takes you into a weird forest to investigate. There is someone in the forest and you are caught and locked in an old mansion. Avoid and hide from dangers in the mansion, survive, defeat them, and escape!

name: Dude Simulator Six
description: Dude Simulator Six is an open world sandbox game. A mortal danger looms over humanity. The planet was invaded by representatives of a distant planetary system.

name: Veranoia: Nightmare of Case 37
description: Help Vera Herdman, a Gifted Detective who can get into victim's nightmares to reveal their mysterious death secrets, to escape the nightmare or reside there forever.

name: Party Friends
description: Join the party extravaganza with Party Friends, a riotous collection of over 20 mini-games spanning 4 wildly entertaining themes - up to 4 players in multiplayer.

name: Affair
description: Hentai game hacker simulator. Hack the accounts of 30+ beauties and get their naked photos!

name: Revenge Of The Colon
description: Revenge of the colon is a story driven, single-player, atmospheric, body horror game with multiple endings. Perform colonoscopies on five patients and discover the horrors concealed deep within them. PS1 horror style!

name: Super Cube 3D
description: Explore beautiful worlds and make new friends in this 3D MMO Platformer.

name: LIve Pict
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Death Run
description: Death Run: The ultimate first-person parkour game in the sky! Experience a journey over floating platforms. Your mission: Survive and find the portal to the next level. Beat the clock for a high score. Dodge obstacles to win. Are you ready?

name: Easter Bunny
description: A very small Running game, where a Rabbit has to collect as many easter eggs as possible. Who will collect the most easter eggs? Compare your score with your friends and family.

name: Zanzibart
description: You are Myrmidon of Loss. Because of your foolishness, your beloved master, Zanzibart, has been killed. Go forth and slaughter enemies and accumulate iterms to avenge Zanzibart.

name: Mr. Sanna Clozz
description: Candied blades, magical guns and tons of fun. Chestnut takes off on an adventure to save Christmas night!

name: Chimp Quest: Spirit Isle
description: Swing into a heartwarming tale in Chimp Quest: Spirit Isle.

name: Tiny Car Mess
description: A super fun, stylized, derby themed racing game with tiny cars that drift and crash into each other. Take the wheel!

name: Love Delivery2
description:
The protagonist lives an uneventful and surplus life.

While shopping for second-hand goods to organize his house, he meets , who has just started broadcasting on the Internet. Strangely, he keeps running into her...

Meanwhile, at the internet broadcasting event, she meets , an extremely recognizable streamer from a large company...!

The love they've never been able to express before, the love of their special someone, is streaming!

name: Railbreak
description: Power through hordes of zombies, '90s arcade style, in this on-rails survival horror shooter.

name: Atoms and Time
description: Survive, evolve, and adapt in a rapidly changing world. Survive the test of time, and become an integral part of your world's biosphere. Or play God and build a full ecosystem in seconds.

name: Detective Zhuge
description: "Detective Zhuge" is a detective puzzle game. Players through the "two-in-one" play, in the game's story level to promote the story, explore the level to find clues to the case, and finally in the trial level, through all the clues obtained, the suspect is finally brought to justice.

name: Forgotten Symphony
description: Sin descripción

name: Trim For Your Dream
description: Step into the shoes of LA's top cannabis trimmer returning to reclaim his glory. Navigate the vibrant world of trimming, chase dreams beyond the physical, and immerse yourself in an unforgettable journey with a chill dub soundtrack. Rediscover your roots in this unique 3D cannabis simulator.

name: Paint Desk Simulator
description: Welcome to Paint Desk Simulator! In this game, you own a small paint-mixing company. As you rise through the ranks, you will start to be able to automate the paint mixing process. You need to strategize your days and always think ahead. Good luck, and all hail Radiant.

name: Sunset of Ate
description: An open world TPS science fiction game

name: Virago: Reality New
description: Virago: Reality New invites you to a chilling adventure where you guide Willow, a survivor escaping abuse, through a world of terror. Master the torchlight, outwit relentless stalkers, and navigate between reality and nightmare. Can you ensure Willow's survival in this heart-pounding pursuit?

name: Infinite Borders
description: With over 10 million downloads, Infinite Borders is a popular strategy game set in China's Three Kingdoms period. Fight alongside legendary heroes to conquer lands and defeat enemies. Build unique teams, guide your city to prosperity, and make special policies. Infinite Borders is calling you!

name: The Divine Speaker: A Bounty Hunter's First Christmas
description: A Chistmas themed afterstory to The Divine Speaker featuring Leos and Raen! Search for the elusive Mister Bells, spend the Winter Solstice together, and win at rock-paper-scissors against your favorite ex-assassin turned bounty hunter!

name: Faster
description: Faster is a high-speed running game where only one winner survives. Race against other runners on a futuristic track set in a surreal city. Knock your opponents off the track and do whatever it takes to stay ahead. It’s parkour meets hardcore, runner vs. runner. Are you faster? It's time to prove it

name: Max's Tales
description: An action platform game which an evil Wizard and his henchmen try to take over the world using an ancient prophecy. Defeat them with the help of special powers, overcome obstacles, face cunning enemies and become the Hero who brought peace to the world.

name: Tiny Survivors
description: Slash and dash through thousands of enemies in this top-down arena shooter. Choose your class, grab a weapon, and descend into the dungeon to collect items and abilities that combine in powerful ways!

name: Yami-iro no Maju
description: Otome game by Daisy2.

name: Skeletery
description: As a skeleton, build your cemetery and defend it against human raids!

name: The Slush Force
description: Aliens are invading, and you, a recently demoted small-town police chief, are caught in the middle of it all. Beat back the extraterrestrial interlopers in this action-packed blend of real-time tactics and turn-based strategy!

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Poppy Playtime Panic
description: The Poppy Playtime Panic DLC is a limited time new level for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals. In this content you can explore and try to survive in the Playtime Co. toy factory based on the original Poppy Playtime game. Characters in this DLC include Huggy Wuggy and Kissy Missy based on the original Poppy Playtime game.

name: Disaster Island
description: Disaster Island is a unique survival based game, where you have to accomplish missions on abandoned island. But It's not gonna be easy, its not ordinary island. You will be confronted by natural disasters and numerous hidden dangers.

name: Casual Pro Wrestling
description: Casual Pro Wrestling is a professional wrestling game with an emphasis on fun. It blends intuitive controls inspired by genre classics with ragdoll physics for added fun and drama. It features couch and online multiplayer and offers a plethora of possibilities for customization.

name: Catnight
description: Catnight is an online multiplayer third-person perspective game that will heat up any party. You will not only fight with your opponents and the enormous amount of furry bullets in the air, but you will also need to survive special gameplay circumstances, which will make every match more dynamic and funnier.

name: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout
description:
Dino Hazard is a cyberpunk RPG with both metroidvania elements and retro atmosphere.

Explore a vast island with distinct ecosystems and creatures. Mandatory grinding is not essential, but players can enjoy fast-paced strategic combat focused on character traits. Gameplay possibilities expand as you restore the facilities.

You play as a very distinct group of characters that need to overcome their differences to defeat a common enemy. You must administrate their skills in order to restore facilities before it is too late. Discover who is the malicious antagonist and escape its traps and puzzles to survive.

name: Starslave
description: An Egyptian ruin with a dark secret. Contains a story, lots of quad runs, randomized elements, and plenty of secrets. Runs on the Copper mod, which is included.

name: Symbiogenesis
description: It is a completely new NFT entertainment that adds "game utility" to "10,000 NFT collectible art".

name: L'automne
description: L'automne is a kinetic, linear narrative story. Summer's gone. The Leaves have fallen. Welcome to Alder Falls.

name: For a Vast Future: Colour Palette 5
description: Sin descripción

name: P.P.SH
description: As a player you'll step into the shoes of either a foreign subversive agent or an Albanian patriot, each with their own mission objectives. Will you infiltrate a key facility, engage in high-stakes firefights, or coordinate with fellow players to spark a rebellion against the oppressive regime?

name: Synced: Winterfest Pack
description: Unlock this DLC of SYNCED to obtain new Runner and weapon skins, and embrace fresh challenges in the new season - Lambent Dawn.

name: Ride 5: Racing Icons Pack
description: With RIDE 5 - Racing Icons Pack, you can race iconic bikes on a track that has been the scene of many memorable races, Estoril!

name: Craft The World: Invasion
description: The player can call for a giant spaceship to appear in orbit, which will send well-armed troops to the surface over and over again.

name: Room Escape: Strange Case 2
description:
Can you escape from Asylum?

In Strange Case 2: Asylum you need to investigate the mysterious case about mental hospital.

name: Cursed Mansion: Rose Christmas Costume
description: New "Santa Outfit" DLC for the Cursed Mansion Game

name: Gloaming Comedian Simulator: Scapegoath Science
description: "Scapegoath Science," the first DLC for Gloaming Comedian Simulator, plunges Barry Sazou into a comically chaotic world of the Mad Scientist. Survive another weekend in Transylvania making your way out of cheer jokes.

name: Highrise City: Metro & Planes
description: Metro & Planes is the first DLC for Highrise City and builds up on the successful formula to create realistic cities with complex economy structures. It will allow you to optimize your public transport systems and to increase your trading capacities.

name: Heretic's Fork: Inside The Fire
description: Dive 'Inside the Fire' with Disturbed: 7 Exclusive Character Variants and 4 Electrifying Tracks from 'Indestructible'!

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Hidden Giftware
description: Brace yourselves—winter has come to Byteland! Get ready to jump into a festive fiesta with 5 new winter island levels. Skate and slide your way into this new chilly chapter filled with slippery challenges all around the HUB area.

name: One Military Camp: Christmas Season
description: Celebrate Christmas with our new free DLC for One Military Camp. Customize your base with armored snowmen. an inflatable Santa, Toy trains and many other decorative items. Build your camp, train your troops and carry out missions to defeat Dragan with a merry mood.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Year 1 Pack
description: Get all the game's additional content released before 31 December 2023 in a single pack, and find your new spots in 4 additional maps. Skate with Chris Cole and show off your style with exclusive outfits and skateboards.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Utopia Holy Roman Empire Music Pack
description: Inspired by the sacred aura and secular might of the Holy Roman Empire, this music collection from composer Utopia adds ten new songs to Europa Universalis IV.

name: Star Conflict: Baphomet. Weapons of victory
description: This pack includes:Active module “Ties of shadows”Weapon Missile module “Trinity”Unique modifier “Baphomet” shield recuperatorUnique modifier “Baphomet” pulse discharge60 monocrystalsA set of resources for 50 ores: (Vanadium + Silicon + Graphite + Osmium) + 50 Crystal shards.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Year One Complete Edition
description: With the Year One Complete Edition of Session: Skate Sim, you get the base game and lots of additional content. Ride the most iconic spots, explore unique maps, meet and play as professional skaters.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle - Battle Royale F2P Edition
description: The Iconic Block-Breaker Returns! Embrace for free the intensity of the Battle Royale, thanks to the Eternal Battle Mode, up to 25 players online. Play now for free and try to reach the top of the leaderboard. Additional modes are available for separate purchase.

name: Eggconsole Silpheed PC-8801mkIISR
description:
The best 3D shooter game of the 80's. Drive the Silpheed fighter jet and crush the ambitions of the Xacalite who have sacked Gloire.

"SILPHEED" is a vertical scrolling 3D shooter game released by Gamearts in 1986.
The player boards the air fighter SA-08 Silpheed and sets out to crush the insurgency.

The game consists of a total of 20 areas, including outer space, inside the base, and above the planet, and players advance while destroying enemies who fly in one after another. Silpheed can be powered up by collecting items placed in each area, and weapons are added according to the score.

At the end of each area, players will be confronted by large enemies with unique attack methods, such as attacking with ring lasers or reflecting our lasers.

name: Dead Estate: Assignment Anya
description: A whole new campaign accessible from the get-go, inspired by classic survival horror games and set prior to the events of the main game. Play as Anya, a fledgling actress who finds herself helplessly lost in the mansion after her film crew is attacked by the undead. Abandoned by her leading man and left alone with nothing but a mask to disguise herself with, Anya must escape the increasingly warped and deadly estate all on her own.

name: Truck Driver: The American Dream - Freedom to Roam
description:
Unload your cargo and soak in breathtaking panoramic vistas with the new Freedom-to-Roam mode. This feature offers the perfect escape for those seeking a more laidback truck driving experience, providing an unstructured way of playing Truck Driver: The American Dream.

With the Freedom-to-Roam update, players will have access to new job opportunities they can take on whenever they like, gaining experience and advancing in the trucking world on their own terms. Every town, city, gas station, and rest stop will present randomly generated missions of varying difficulties, sending players to deliver cargo across the map.

name: Yume Tsushin
description: Yume Tsushin is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Wormiko. You can explore the dream world to collect effects, or leave the room and explore the town instead.

name: Hentai Girls: Pretty Christmas
description: Complete puzzles of attractive female characters that look like they're straight out of an anime. There are over 30 levels to complete! Once you've completed a puzzle, you can always view your character in the gallery.

name: True Stalker
description: True Stalker is a fan-made game based on the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. series taking place after the events of Call of Pripyat, where you experience a completely original, lengthy storyline through the eyes of an ordinary stalker named Axe.

name: Mobile Suit Baba
description: A mysterious force is out to steal all the Fruit! Help Baba & friends foil their plans by maneuvering gigantic mech suits around. Features tactical puzzling action, heart-wrenching storytelling and extra challenges over a total of 43 missions.

name: Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1+2P
description: A bundle that includes Ao no Kanata no Four Rhythm Extra1 and Extra2 in one package, featuring the side stories between Mashiro and Misaki.

name: The Artist Colors
description: Poetry, painters, colors and animated interactive elements: the ideal educational fun! Plus, it's so easy to use that your little ones will be able to explore it without hassle.

name: Eggconsole Hydlide PC-8801
description:
Operate the hero Jim and defeat the demon Varalys, the strongest in mythology! A classic action RPG representing the 1980s. An active role-playing game released by T&E SOFT in 1984.

The player takes on the role of Jim, a brave young man, and his objective is to restore peace to Fairyland by searching for the lost gem and defeating the demon Varalys. Action is the key to this game. Players switch between attack and defense modes as they fight monsters by slamming Jim into them.

This game is a pioneer of the Japanese PC fantasy RPGs of the 1980's. It is a monster title that reigned at the top of the popularity rankings in PC game magazines for a long time, with its diverse and beautifully composed fields, including plains, castles, churches, and labyrinths.

name: 100 Demon Fantasia

name: Rail Romanesque Origin
description: Rail Romanesque Origin is a console port of the romance visual novel Maitetsu: Last Run!!. The original game was released for PC in Japan on October 30, 2020.

name: Cybercore Leap
description: Embark on a captivating journey alongside your loyal assistant in this experimental 3D platformer game. Equip yourself with the JumpPack and antigravity grapple as you undertake your mission: locate the cybercore and execute a crucial reset.

Elf-Shield is one of the best games if you are fan of late 80s' PC games or are looking for bite-size simple game. This game is a modernized BreakOut like action game with 80s taste Pixel Graphics and Anime Style graphics.

description: Umbrella Girl is a 2D belt-scroll action adventure game. You can enjoy various actions through the character's type transformation, and become the main character to free citizens from acid rain.

description: A Casual 3D Physics Puzzle game, where you combine cats of the same size and color to create larger cats. Fit as many cats into the box as you can before letting a cat fall out and touch the aluminum foil on the table! Try to break your old high scores!

name: VTOL VR: EF-24 Mischief - Electronic Warfare
description: The EF-24G is a two-seat, twin-engine, variable-sweep fighter aircraft which has been adapted and equipped to play a major role in electronic warfare. Specialized sensors and advanced multi-mode ECM pods give it the capability to find, target, and wreak havoc on all kinds of enemy transmissions.

name: Poly Roam
description: Poly Roam is a survival, driving road-trip game featuring a large, explorable environment that is procedurally generated. Loot, gather, and drive as much as you can.

name: Social Status: Life Simulator
description: In this online survival life-simulator, you start off in town with no money and no prospects in life. Get an income, a house, interact with other players, save money, buy the things you have always dreamed of. Become a part of the social elite and be remembered as a social legend.

name: Where Jellyfish
description: Searching for a large number of jellyfish. A carefully hand drawn 4K scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Ruff City

name: Polyhop: The Skybound Islands
description: Polyhop is a platforming game. Jump across the sky islands of a broken world, traverse through numerous hazards, and reactivate ancient pillars to pull the world together.

name: Deep In The Snowy Night 2
description: After drunkenly passing out on a sidewalk, Christopher wakes up in yet another nightmare. Venture through the many different zones to uncover the truth behind these strange nightmares.
